segments.text: I'm observing a peculiar scene in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is diligently drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus seems entirely on that one task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her foot is already in a growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh my goodness, the sink is actually overflowing right now!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just gushing over the front edge of the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm truly surprised she hasn't noticed it yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That's a considerable amount of water spilling onto the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like the drain simply isn't taking anything away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting wider with every passing second, it's quite alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of fear for anyone who might slip on that wet surface.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation could really cause some significant water damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm garden outside the window is striking, almost eerie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she looks down and realizes what's happening very soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
